website_summaries.verdict: The Dell Inspiron 15 3000 Series (3558) is a capable desktop-replacement laptop with solid specs, plenty of storage, and long battery life—all for less than $350.
cons: A lot of flex in the lid when open

customer_reviews.title: Love my new DELL Inspiron
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the performance of this laptop (so far). It seems to have all the functions I require. It is very good value for money, and while not being too heavy is fairly sturdy and is a good quality item. I was very pleased to discover that it has a CDRom drive - something I didn't expect as most modern devices seem to lack these. I find this very useful for a number of reasons. The keyboard is well spaced and very comfortable, and although I am not at all tech-minded I enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie

customer_reviews.title: it's good value for money a really good computer
customer_reviews.text: I use this Dell Inspiration when not on my main computer, it's good value for money a really good computer, it's a really good buy well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Oxley

customer_reviews.title: Works well but the mouse/track pad feel is a bit clunky and feels of poor quality. You have to press really firmly and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's quite a size but that's because I thought I was getting a 13 inch so that's my fault! Works well but the mouse/track pad feel is a bit clunky and feels of poor quality. You have to press really firmly and it makes a loud "click" noise from the mechanics of it I guess. The McAfree stuff they preload it with is annoying and pops up constantly so going to have to look at a way of getting rid of that. The typeface, style, look is very android.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a good laptop for me.I am not a techie but it does everything I want it to do and has a nice clear screen and a good soft touch keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Everything i wanted from a laptop.Very happy with purchase.Had my last Dell laptop 14 years & was dubious about updating,but the new Dell is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and in perfect condition (bought as open box from amazon warehouse so ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in perfect condition (bought as open box from amazon warehouse so a great saving). So far it's great, only worry (and that's why the 4 stars) is that it maybe feels a little fragile, I'm careful not to press on the screen when it's closed and I'm moving it.
customer_reviews.author: La Vidalerie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but over months the battery got worse
customer_reviews.text: Using it right now, love it, it's battery life is nowhere near what it used to be when I got it, I used to take it to college and it would last all day and then some but now I will only take it in on a half day or with my charger
customer_reviews.author: LilRed666

customer_reviews.title: But product was not so good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 'Used' Dell Inspiron 15 3000 laptop from amazon. My assumption was that though its a used product, this laptop carried 'Refurbished' tag from amazon. So it was a safe bet for me to buy anyway. But product was not so good as expected. The display screen used to flicker from Day 1. I thought this was temporary but its not. From all other aspects i would give a rating of 5 for this refurbished product. Buy this if you want to take a calculated risk. Ovarall, i would go with a rating of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have to be careful while using power adapter socket on ...
customer_reviews.text: Have to be careful while using power adapter socket on the laptop Windows 10 installed on the laptop has lot of problem. Frequently freezes Windows edge does not open Start button freezes very frequently and also online help about this problem is not helpful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I had the thing for three weeks with nothing but trouble, it kept locking me out, freezing, switching itself off as and when it felt so inclined to do. I purchased a Dell as I have had two previously neither of which I could find fault with. Maybe it was windows 10 that was at fault, don't know, anyway gave it to my son and daughter in law. Could not send it back as it contained all my personal bank details etc.
customer_reviews.author: grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop for just over £300. I purchased it for using office, the internet and low level publishing. Did I expect to be able to do things that you would have to spend over £1,000 on to do so? No I didn’t, I got exactly what I was willing to spend. Great so far. 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: I love New York

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust uses versions!
customer_reviews.text: Brought the laptop as used. It mentioned there were a few cosmetic issues but the software worked fine. Upon getting the laptop I saw no damage to the laptop but it had a faulty display driver which would cause the screen to crash. This happened frequently so therefore I had to send it back. The laptop it self is very good but not happy with the laptop I was given
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this laptop for my 11 year old Grand-daughter as ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this laptop for my 11 year old Grand-daughter as her old one died. She has found it ideal for school work and recreational use.
customer_reviews.author: Corebyspencer

customer_reviews.title: Dell Inspiron 15 3000 Series 15.6 inch Laptop (Intel Core i3 Processor, 8 GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, HD TrueLife) - Black
customer_reviews.text: Apart from repeating letters while typing enjoying the use of Dell Inspiron 15 3000 series 15.6 inch laptop. Especially for the price. Good value and ideal image quality.
customer_reviews.author: hnp1959

customer_reviews.title: Four stars.
customer_reviews.text: According to Which Magazine Dell was 2nd in the top ten recommended Laptops of 2016, with Apple Mac number one,of course. Laptop is good, but can be slow at times. Hence four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rather not say.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I wanted in a laptop. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: From iPad to laptop
customer_reviews.text: Pleased I bought this. Now learning how to use it to its best advantage. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Cinders

customer_reviews.title: great price and spec plus it's a Dell I am ...
customer_reviews.text: great price and spec plus it's a Dell I am very happy. Not a scratch on it when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: [sic] poet

customer_reviews.title: Review of laptop computer. Dell.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality laptop computer. Value for money. Good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyday pc
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and fast PC for everyday use, even comes with 20GB free Dropbox
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Lovely lap top but it comes with Windows 10 which I have yet to learn to love!
customer_reviews.author: kes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't happy with the delay on delivery great laptop .
customer_reviews.author: iain urquhart

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Runs great. Looks great. Minimal bloatware. Track pad can act a little funny sometimes and plastic case clicks a little if you pick it up a certain way. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keiran

customer_reviews.title: He is very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He is very satisfied with it. Very impressed with speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GOOD NICE ONE DELL LAPTRUMPTOP PC SO HAPPY OK after 6 month with no laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. Dove

customer_reviews.title: Good value computer
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. If working as a small business as I do its got everything you need.if you want to play games its works fine but if that's your main function then go for something a bit better, If you want a basic computer with a little bit more then this is well suited.
customer_reviews.author: juventus2746m

customer_reviews.title: basically OK but explorer very slow and no matter what ...
customer_reviews.text: basically OK but explorer very slow and no matter what I do I can't get google chrome [my preferred option by far] to consistently load properly and continue working without 'not responding'
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great Dell
customer_reviews.text: This item was to replace a stolen HP laptop. Having previously owned a number of Dell laptops/desktops we knew of their build quality and reliability. We have not been disappointed. This is the fastest machine we've had yet, so are genuinely very pleased with it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ady C

customer_reviews.title: A good Buy.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it does all I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Richards

customer_reviews.title: An okay basic laptop for the money. Keyboard is ...
customer_reviews.text: An okay basic laptop for the money. Keyboard is a bit springy and flexes as you type. Power connector sticks straight out and looks a bit vulnerable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I actually use my old one as this one is useless. I think I will be throwing this in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the specification but it is slower than my current laptop which is 7 years old. I actually use my old one as this one is useless. I think I will be throwing this in the bin instead of my old one
customer_reviews.author: Jack .P.Sodhi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I paid (£300) but I am slightly dissapointed in the general snappiness of the computer. Bearing in mind that I only use it for MS word, streaming and research and not real gaming or anything intensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: not what i expected seems cheaply made, had a Toshiba before that was much better. For example doesn't have a light for num lock and touch mouse is really sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily the worst experience I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Easily the worst experience I ever had. It has never even come close to functioning properly. Barely laods a web page, takes several minutes to show the contents of drive, if at all. Touchpad is a nightmare despite attempts to tune it. Dell are hopeless. After days and days wasted reinstalling and reinstating my data, I have spent the price of four laptops in wasted time and it is still no use at all. Unless I get action form Amazon or Dell I will stop using both companies. Really not good enough
customer_reviews.author: ed taaffe

customer_reviews.title: I like it in every way
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an IT specialist nor a gamer, so I don't really expect much. This computer works properly, as described, and satisfies my needs. I like it in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy Dell
customer_reviews.text: Had dell before always been great this insperon is a bagain of s..t . Will only buy Samsung from now on. Avoid at all costs!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I completed the name, password, etc, when the laptop finally booted up. Eventually it said restart to progress ... and restarted back at the beginning! And again, and again, and again. Eventually I wiped the drive and installed Linux, which works.Even with Linux it needs a RAM upgrade to do any work ... and you can't. The RAM is only accessible by removing the keyboard (they've been taking lessons form VW) which invalidates the guarantee. Do your homework, and buy something that works
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: I wish I have not purchased this computer to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I have not purchased this computer to replace my old one with Window 7. The Window 10 is too complicated to work with!!!!
customer_reviews.author: F C

customer_reviews.title: Complete rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Without doubt the worst computer that I have ever bought. I used to like Dell but this computer is a joke in terms of quality and speed. It is like using an old computer from the last century. Propbably running Windows 10 on 4Gb RAM is also a major no no. Dell - shame on you for producing such poor quality rubbish. I have sent it back. AVOID
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO SLOW
customer_reviews.text: Brought this laptop as read dell supposed to be very good make. I only use laptop for the basics and got this to replace an old toshiba laptop which was supposed to be a terrible make. I have got to say my old toshiba puts this laptop to shame this is so slow . My internet banking takes so much longer to do on this , I can not recommend anything about this laptop apart from it turns on quickly. NOT IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.author: mr p r lucy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: having bought this item I can not get it to open. please help
customer_reviews.author: william

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron 15 3000 Series 15.6 inch Laptop (Intel Core i3 Processor, 8 GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, HD TrueLife) - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Intel Core i3| Size Name:8 GBDell Inspiron 15 3000 Series 15.6 inch Laptop (Intel Core i3 Processor, 8 GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, HD TrueLife) - Black.

shipping material
feature_bullets: Packed with features, easy to use, built to last.
HD TrueLife Display for clear and bright images.
Intel Core i3 Processor and 8GB RAM handles day to day tasks with ease.
A 1TB Hard Drive to store all your documents and media.
Waves MaxxAudio adds a new dimension to your listening experience.
